ComicInfo.Title: The Dark Dungeon; Second Floor Rear!; Ghouls Rush In; Off With His Head; Talking Corpse
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dark Dungeon: A man keeps mastiffs half-starved in the dungeon so that he can press a button to release them in the event thieves enter his house. His nephew drugs him and wheels his wheelchair into their enclosure so that he will get his money when the dogs finish him. The man's ghost comes back and does the same thing to the nephew.
Second Floor Rear!: A landlady rents an apartment to straw men.
Ghouls Rush In: A body snatcher is thwarted in his efforts by cemetery rats that chew through coffins in order to pull the bodies into their warrens.
Off With His Head: An executioner is frightened to death when someone places a mirror in the bottom of his head basket so that he sees his own head in there.
Talking Corpse: When a medium is exposed as a fake, she shoots her client, but it turns out that she had more ability than she thought she did.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Bernie Krigstein,Dick Ayers,Manny Stallman,Joe Sinnott,Ogden Whitney,Bernie Krigstein,Dick Ayers,Manny Stallman,Joe Sinnott
ComicInfo.Inker: Ogden Whitney,Bernie Krigstein,Dick Ayers,Manny Stallman,Joe Sinnott,Ogden Whitney,Bernie Krigstein,Dick Ayers,Manny Stallman,Joe Sinnott
